channel.title: How do I change Sources with one server?
channel.description: Can anyone help? Thx I'll give all credit to who ever helps thanks again!

item.title: How do I change Sources with one server?
item.dc:creator: @Maedie1 Maedie1
item.description:
@Maedie1 wrote:

Ok, you need two sources. Your server you run now and the one you want. Shut down your first server for a minute and copy all your character files. Then, open the folder of the server you wish to switch to and paste all the char files in that folder. Then, go to server.java and make sure your port is the same as the old server. Run the second server and your good. If you didn’t get this, PM me.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change Sources with one server?
